general.gigTitle: design, redesign wordpress website, business website development

sellerCard.oneLiner: Creative Solutions For Website Design and Development
sellerCard.description:
Hey there! Jubayed here, your website's rocket booster (Website Developer, 3+ years of strong expertise)

Ever dreamt of a website that turns heads, wows visitors, and converts like crazy? That's my jam!

I've crafted over 250+ websites using the magic of Website Development with sleek design, seamless responsiveness & unique personality

But wait, there's more! My creative team can whip up epic branding magic (logos, colors) and UI/UX with Figma

I believe in creating value, collaborations & contributing to success

Ready to blast off? Let's talk

description.content:
Ready to launch your business with a stunning, modern, and fully responsive WordPress website? 


Whether it's a business website, a WordPress blog, or an online store, I've got you covered with the perfect mix of creativity and functionality!


As an expert in website development and WordPress Elementor, I'll help you to design, redesign, revamp, or build website that not only looks amazing but converts like a charm. Let's make your brand stand out and captivate your audience!


Here's what I offer:

 

  • Build WordPress web-site with booking/payment features 
  • Custom WordPress blog design (news, personal, or business) 
  • WooCommerce-powered ecommerce store 
  • Super responsive, mobile-optimized designs 
  • On-brand layouts based on your logo and color scheme 
  • Elementor Pro for drag-and-drop editing ease 
  • Lightning-fast performance with built-in SEO optimization 
  • Integration with Google Maps, Analytics, and social media


Why me? 


  • 24/7 support- "Yes, I drink a lot of coffee"
  • Easy video tutorials to edit your site, even if you're "not techy"


Please check my gig FAQs for more details; inbox your requirements.


Let's chat and build your WordPress website today!

slide.name: design, redesign wordpress website, business website development
design, redesign wordpress website, business website development

questionsAndAnswers.question: I am interested and ready to purchase, What are the requirements to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
Sure, you're ready to get started you'll need:

A domain name and hosting (where your website lives online). Think of it like an address and a house for your website. Your logo and any content you want on your website, like text about your business and pictures.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why should I message you before placing an order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: It's important to chat first so I can understand exactly what you need.  That way, I can make sure you get the right website package and don't miss anything important.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will all pages be responsive and mobile-friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, all the pages are super responsive and mobile-friendly and support all devices and browsers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide hosting and domain services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I can't sell hosting myself, but I can recommend some good options. Let's chat more about that!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to edit my website easily after delivery? I do not know programming or coding.c
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! You can easily edit your website yourself after I build it. No coding skills are needed! There's a tool called Elementor that lets you add text and pictures with drag-and-drop, just like building with blocks.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I see any samples of your website development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Of course! Just send me a message and I'll show you some examples of websites I've built.  You can also see some on my Fiverr profile here: https://www.fiverr.com/users/wpweb_tech/portfolio

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I have your Email, Skype, Telegram, or WhatsApp?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, this is against the Terms of Service of Fiverr. I never communicate outside of Fiverr. But we can chat or do meetings about your needs through Fiverr!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide support after the delivery?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I'll be happy to help you get started with your new website for up to 2 weeks after it's finished.  After that, I won't be able to offer support for free.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you work alone or in a team?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I have a team of creative Figma designers and website developers. We can manage any number of projects without any problem.

reviews.comment:
This is my second project with them. The first project - website design was very good. 
The second project wasn't.
Deck design project was challenging, mainly due to a lack of professionalism and attention to details, which did not meet my expectations. Communication was frustrating as basic logic wasn't always implemented, and it felt like I had to explain things repeatedly without progress. Ultimately, the low effort and prolonged timeline led me to abandon the collaboration and complete the task myself.

seller_response.comment:
Thank you for your feedback. However, I’m unsure what went wrong with the last file. I’m feeling frustrated because I saw you gave a bad rating.

At one point, you mentioned that you loved the design layout, and based on that feedback, I completed the design. In the last round, I made modifications according to your feedback.

Regarding the last feedback, I have incorporated the changes and worked to ensure that the design is consistent throughout the presentation. Also, I have provided you with both the Canva and presentation files based on your satisfaction.

You know that, Client satisfaction is our first priority. I was open to your unlimited revisions until your satisfaction.

reviews.comment:
Don't know where to start from. I had a working and well designed onepager website which needed some finishing. First, they priced me for 5 pages, but I renegotiated later. 
Second, they literally demolished the neat structure of the page. No sense of size and proportions. they kept adding unnecessary transitions and after 2 weeks I had to stop them and start from scratch. 
There was no added value, only constant frustration. 
The final delivery is worse than what they started with. As one reviewer said rightfully,  they left me with a carcas.  A one week job procrastinated into one month, and now I am looking for someone else. BUT I WONT BE LOOKING ON FIVERR. 

FIVERR aowed these guys to  boost their 5 star reviews through fake comments as these guys couldn't  have had 500 jobs in a couple of months! I won't be trusting FIVERR reviews as they are misleading. Bad job, FEVERR!, one star for you!

seller_response.comment:
Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. I fully respect your feedback and value every client’s opinion. However, I would like to address your concerns and provide clarity regarding the work delivered.

Throughout the project, I adhered to all the requirements you outlined and ensured that every task was completed to your specifications. Here is a summary of my efforts:

All requested features were implemented, as shown in this screenshot: https://prnt.sc/fLOLZIy8sfoM.
The updated website with all the features can be viewed here: https://sunraised.co.uk/.
I completed every task you asked for, as demonstrated in this screenshot: https://prnt.sc/hWiAxzXF0Nzl.
Even after delivering the order, I continued to provide support and addressed all issues to ensure you faced no problems, as shown here: https://prnt.sc/MmpraSD4btUE.
I understand that the parallax effect was not implemented to your satisfaction, and I truly regret that it did not meet your expectations. However, all other features and tasks were completed according to the requirements provided.

Additionally, the final delivery was mutually approved during our meeting, which I believe reflected your satisfaction with the work at that time.

I strive to provide the best possible service to all my clients, and I regret that this experience did not fully meet your expectations. If there is anything further I can do to resolve your concerns or improve your satisfaction, please let me know.

Thank you for your understanding, and I hope we can address this matter amicably.

reviews.comment: Jubayed really worked to make sure my vision for the project was clear. She responded quickly when I had questions. I think the project is something we both can be proud of.

seller_response.comment: It's been a pleasure to help you. I look forward to helping you with more projects. Thank you.

reviews.comment: They are provided an outstanding custom WordPress solution for my business. The website is beautifully designed, fully responsive, and perfectly aligned with my goals.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your kind words 😍 I think it is you who made this easy for me with your proper and super clear instructions. I am definitely looking forward to working on your next project.

reviews.comment: Thank you so much! Jubayed went above and beyond to assist me. Very professional and experienced. I look forward to working with Jubayed again!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your appreciation.

reviews_snippet.comment: Jubayed really worked to make sure my vision for the project was clear. She responded quickly when I had questions. I think the project is something we both can be proud of.
They are provided an outstanding custom WordPress solution for my business. The website is beautifully designed, fully responsive, and perfectly aligned with my goals.
Thank you so much! Jubayed went above and beyond to assist me. Very professional and experienced. I look forward to working with Jubayed again!
